dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, I'm at the entrance of a dark cave.

dialogue.speaker: Guard
dialogue.text: Who are you and what do you want in here?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm a brave adventurer seeking fortune and glory.

dialogue.speaker: Guard
dialogue.text: Foolish mortal, the cave is full of danger. You'll never make it out alive!
